name: Sudden Storm
description:
This is my participation in the:  My first Game Jam: Winter 2023

Story

Sundden Storm is a game in which two friends, Scar and Penélope, decide to take their regular hike in the mountains after snowing. Unfortunately, in the middle of the path it starts to snow again, now Scar have to make and Grow a firecamp to make sure that the snow in Penélope's wings get melt, if the fire goes out and her delicate wings get damaged, she can die...

Can you get all the three endings?

Crédits:

Made by:

 Rui Maurício (Ruipdpm)
